item.title: The Upinion Project
item.description: With the advance of Microblogging sites, citizen publishing has taken the lead in dissemination of news, politics and ideas. A major setback of this revolution is the potential overhead to find the information we seek. Many times microblogging seems to only work for spamming and ads. With the Upinion project, we aim to bring the human emotions into play to separate information from the seemingly endless, automatically generated messages.
